attributes.action: Not reward Terrorists familys in Northern Ireland with £12.000 for their past evil deeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Not reward Terrorists familys in Northern Ireland with £12.000 for their past evil deeds."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20566


Prime Minister's Office
